ComicInfo.Summary:
*Overview* Fear-Feeder - A horrible creature goes on a rampage to sate its hunger for fear. The Eyes of the Beholders - An aging ballerina makes a deal with Satan to regain her youth, but will she be willing to pay the price? Castle of Fear! - An exorcist goes to battle the Devil in a house he has claimed. Sanctuary? - An unscrupulous business man intends to make a safe haven for himself on an island, but not if the local voodoo lord has anything to say about it.
